# /aiaw-self-replace-ascii-diagrams

Scan documents for ASCII diagrams and replace them with Draw.io diagrams and PNG images.

Use this command when working **on** the AI-Assisted Work repository (not when using it as a submodule).

## Instructions

**Read and follow the full agent instructions at:**

`agents/image-management/replace-ascii-diagrams.md`

Also read the supporting documentation:
- `agents/image-management/README.md` - Overview
- `agents/image-management/AGENTS.md` - Agent rules
